  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Puntos característicos, críticos y singulares</string>
            <string language="en">Characteristic points: singular and critical points</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Charakteristische Punkte: einzigartige und 
kritische Punkte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Points caractéristiques : points 
singuliers et critiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pontos característicos: pontos singulares 
e críticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punti caratteristici: punti singolari e 
critici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά σημεία: μοναδικά και κρίσιμα 
σημεία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el estudio de los puntos críticos en una función real de variable real. Se estudian los teoremas de Weierstrass y de Rolle para una función derivable en un intervalo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study critical points in real-valued functions. It studies the theorems of Weierstrass and Rolle for a function which is differentiable in an interval.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto crítico</string>
            <string language="en">critical point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto singular</string>
            <string language="en">singular point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Rolle</string>
            <string language="en">Rolle's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Weierstrass</string>
            <string language="en">Weierstrass's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, kritische Punkte in den Realwertfunktionen zu studieren.
Sie studiert die Theoreme von Weierstrass und von Rolle für 
eine Funktion, die in einem Abstand differenzierbar ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier les points critiques dans des fonctions à 
valeurs réelles. Elle étudie les théorèmes de Weierstrass et
de Rolle pour une fonction qui est différentiable dans un intervalle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
pontos críticos em funções real-valued. Estuda os theorems de
Weierstrass e de Rolle para uma função que seja differentiable em um
intervalo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i punti critici nelle funzioni real-valued. Studia i 
teoremi di Weierstrass e di Rolle per una funzione che è 
differenziabile in un intervallo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στα κρίσιμα σημεία μελέτης στις real-valued λειτουργίες. 
Μελετά τα θεωρήματα Weierstrass και Rolle για μια 
λειτουργία που είναι differentiable σε ένα διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kritischer Punkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einzigartiger Punkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Rolles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Weierstrasss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">point critique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">point singulier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le théorème de Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le théorème de Weierstrass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponto crítico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponto singular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorem de Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorem de Weierstrass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punto critico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punto singolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teorema del Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teorema del Weierstrass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κρίσιμο σημείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μοναδικό σημείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεώρημα Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεώρημα Weierstrass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
